projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A Vue.js-based personal portfolio website showcasing projects and experience.
projects.detailedSummary: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Vue.js and TypeScript. Features include dynamic project showcases, interactive timeline, and a contact form. The site demonstrates best practices in web development and modern UI/UX design principles.

projects.title: Task Manager Application for University Research Project
projects.description: Full-stack task management application with real-time updates.
projects.detailedSummary: A comprehensive task management solution that allows teams to collaborate in real-time. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, real-time notifications, and detailed analytics dashboard.

projects.title: Open Source Library
projects.description: A utility library for handling complex data structures in JavaScript.
projects.detailedSummary: A comprehensive JavaScript library that provides efficient implementations of various data structures and algorithms. Features include tree traversal, graph algorithms, and sorting utilities.
